website_summaries.verdict: A world-class water filter that can be used with Maytag, KitchenAid, and other globally-recognized refrigerator brands.
pros: Reduces 24 water contaminants, including waterborne parasites and pesticides
Designed for use with side-by-side and top freezer/bottom freezer refrigerator models
Requires only a few seconds to replace the filter
cons: Pricey in contrast to comparable options

customer_reviews.title: Does not replace model 4396508
customer_reviews.text: This model said it would replace model 4396508. It did not fit. The notches at the top are different and the top part is slightly longer.
customer_reviews.author: C Wilhite

customer_reviews.title: No faith in this filter after doing a water test.
customer_reviews.text: This filter was significantly more expensive this time then last. I have a Water Quality meter so I tested my tap water which is 71, after running 10 gallons of water this meter shows this filtered water at 63, bottled water at 20. I don't think it's doing what we hope it is.
customer_reviews.author: Auburn Skincare

customer_reviews.title: Black filter material floating in water
customer_reviews.text: After over a month of running water through the filter I'm still getting black floaters of filter media in the water. The instructions say to run several gallons through the filter initially however I've run over 30 gallons and I get floaters in every glass. I contacted EveryDrop and was told that since I purchased the filter through a third party (Amazon), the warranty is void. I specifically chose this filter because it's Whirlpool's brand thinking they would have the best filter even though it's 5X the cost of other brands. I regret buying the filter and wish I would have saved my money and bought a less expensive one.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great fillter
customer_reviews.text: This provides more comprehensive filtering than the generic filters made overseas. The tap water here is pretty good so filtering is not really required, we just get a bit worried every now and then. Certainly no detectable smell or taste after filtering. I left a carafe of water in the refrigerator for a week when we went out of town. On our return there was none of that fogging that indicates bacteria. I've ordered several of these and there have been minor differences in packaging. The genuine filters have a foil hologram. Finally, these also seem to last longer than the generic filters.
customer_reviews.author: Noodler's Pen

customer_reviews.title: No warranty coverage from Whirlpool if sold through Amazon.com
customer_reviews.text: Please do not buy this product. It failed for us within 2 months of use. Whirlpool does not have warranty coverage for products that are sold through 3rd party sellers, such as Amazon.com. Amazon.com, please don't sell products from manufacturers who void their warranties if the product is not directly sold by them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Water Tester Poorly.
customer_reviews.text: I installed this water filter and ran double the amount of water through the filter as required. I then tested the water with a water purity test. The water tested much worse than the six month old water filter that I was replacing and the old filter cost half the price. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Looks at fits like the Original
customer_reviews.text: Looks at fits like the Original. My frig is a Thermador 48" refrigerator using the Whirlpool designed water filtration system (old Whirlpool part #4396510). Was worried that the neck was a little shorter than the original but if you look closely the body of the filter it now has grooves in it that help the threads. Fit like a glove into my frig with no issues. Actually easier than I remembered it in the past with the original. Also, my water flow was dramatically increased which is great as it takes shorter time to fill your pitchers. And I like the fact that this filters more things out than the original (as stated on packaging and website).
customer_reviews.author: Estelamari

customer_reviews.title: Water never tasted so good
customer_reviews.text: I tried to save money and bought several of the knock-off versions of this made in China. One of them busted my refrigerator. The other two made the water taste strange. This filter though was amazing. You just flush water through it, as per the directions, and you have 6 months of amazingly clean and fresh water to enjoy any time. They also have a nice subscription program you can join to save additional money and get continual replacements automatically, every 6 months. This is the original filter and will be probably more than others you find online (...it's worth it though). Don't get suckered into using the imitation ones. I have and learned.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy cheap if you expect it to work/last
customer_reviews.text: We have used this product before, and the cheaper ones. It is expensive, there are cheaper ones. They sell the cheaper ones in bulk for a reason, they don't last long. We buy the more expensive one because it lasts us over a year or more. We had to wait to get this one, and I can tell you, in my neighborhood, the water is brown. Yuck. There is a deffinate difference between having a good filter, and having a cheap filter, or, no filter. We will always by this filter as long as we have this refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Lambert

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Received a USED filter. Have not needed to put it in until now and my husband unwrapped the taped up package (should have known) and it was loaded with water inside the filter, so it was used. Now, I can't return it!!! I am 8 days past due. I am very upset, these are not cheap and now non-returnable!!!! very unfair, I got ripped off. I have never had to complain or write a review like this. I have always had great, quality products sent to me, but I am very unhappy
customer_reviews.author: M.H.

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturers recommended
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Researched the off brand and China manufactured knock-offs and founds that testing labs did not show that they removed alll of the impurities they were supposed to. Decided not to risk it and purchased ‘everydrop’ As suggested by our refrigerator manufacturer. It arrived quick, installed easy, and no dripping/leaks. The water taste great again and we notice now flows faster again. Will reorder again next time. Few extra $$ for the quality of clean water with a tested product is worth it to me. Taking the cheap way out not always best.
customer_reviews.author: Monica From nj

customer_reviews.title: cause leak in Kitchenaid refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: they cause a slow leak in the water spout on my kitchenaid superba refrigerator. They are the only listed replacement filter authorized now, and they cause a leak. Get ready to sit a cup under the spout overnight so you don't step in a puddle in the morning
customer_reviews.author: D. Thorne

customer_reviews.title: Better performing filter than the cheaper knock offs
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper models are available but be warned, "Tested to" a NSF standard doesn't mean it meets that standard (like me testing my strength to Arnold Schwarzenegger he's much, much stronger) Most of the cheaper filters MAY meet NSF Standard 42 which is only aesthetics (Chlorine/odor/taste). More expensive filters like this one also meet NSF standard 53 which includes contaminants that have adverse health effects.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: The correct filter to use. Avoid the generic knockoffs. They suck.
customer_reviews.text: The generics suck. This doesn't. Unfortunately, you get what you pay for, and in this case, you're gonna pay more. But, you're gonna get more. Avoid the cheap knockoffs. Really. Avoid them. They are not worth it. Buy this expensive filter and change it every 6 months with a new one. Better yet, try to buy multiples when they go on sale and keep them stocked up in your kitchen when it comes time to replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin A. Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit even though the it should fit my refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: I punched in my make and model number to confirm that this filter would fit my fridge. It said it would. It does NOT fit it. I can put it into the fridge but I can not turn it to lock it. It clearly has some differences in the design from the one I took out. Since I purchased this more than 90 days ago (I keep one handy so I can replace instantly once I get the red light on the fridge), I am outside of the return window. So after being told this would fit my fridge, I am out ~$50. For anyone with with a WP GD5PHAXMS10 made in 2005, don't buy this!
customer_reviews.author: KingFarts

customer_reviews.title: It fits!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Whirlpool 2002 Side by Side model (GD5LHGXLQ02) and was nervous about ordering after I read the reviews that there was 2 different manufacturing vendors and the specs were not the same. However, I managed to received a filter that fit my 14+ year old unit. All is good.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Riggenbach

customer_reviews.title: Very little instructions included
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to install. Label states "WARNING: Read entire manual. Failure to follow all guides and rules could cause personal injury or property damage..." What manual? There are no instructions about installation of this device other than a barely visible white tiny illustration printed on the black label. It does state to flush 4 gallons of water through filter before using.
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice

customer_reviews.title: Excellent water filter/purifier for refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: In years past, we searched high and low for a water filter/purifier for our Whirlpool side-by-side refrigerator/freezer. We found the Whirlpool EveryDrop 5 water filter, bought, used it, and there was no need for any more searching for a water filter for our refrigerator. We've used the EveryDrop 5 ever since, and have been very pleased. It's simple to install and prepare for use. The water has a fresh, clean, bright, and satisfying taste. Try it, I think you'll like it.
customer_reviews.author: Allens2.4.2

customer_reviews.title: At least they're getting cheaper. Filters lead.
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded to these after they came out, probably due to Flint, Michigan. I think when I started buying these, they cost 50 per cent more. We used the cheaper ones before these, but those don't filter lead or chlorine. No issues with fit in the fridge, although the neighbors get me to help with theirs as well since any fridge filter is finicky.
customer_reviews.author: Martin K

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what the fridge needed
customer_reviews.text: I can not figure out how to reset the gage inside the fridge but that has nothing to do with the quality of the filter. It came exactly how it looked online which is great because it was the same as my old filter.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Tessier

customer_reviews.title: No longer fits our fridge
customer_reviews.text: This filter no longer fits our Whirlpool GD5YHA. In 2019, when I tried to force one in it damaged the filter housing and caused a leak. Decided to try another one in 2020 but had the same difficulty installing it and gave up instead of risking another leak in the new filter housing.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Priest

customer_reviews.title: This water filter is great. It makes such a difference in the water ...
customer_reviews.text: This water filter is great. It makes such a difference in the water quality. Installation was very easy and it fits perfectly. I was going to buy a water pitcher before I found this. This is a better purchase because it filters the water and the ice coming out of the refrigerator. Buying from Amazon makes it easy also!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Hill

customer_reviews.title: WORKS FOR ME
customer_reviews.text: Installs easily in my 20 year old Kitchenaid fridge. Water is crystal clear & taste great. All in all I see no difference, other than the price, in this EDR5RXD1 #5 EveryDrop Whirlpool filter & the discontinued Pur/Whirlpool #4396508 filter that I'm replacing.
customer_reviews.author: TEX

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit our model
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit our Whirlpool refrigerator that it was supposed to. Return was easy, but it was frustrating to have to try multiple "correct" filters to find one that would work.
customer_reviews.author: Shari Damaso

customer_reviews.title: Great filter
customer_reviews.text: Well made filter. Previous filter caused water to drip in door where you fill a glass and cause discoloration on fill lever and overflow trying. No more drip with this filter. Highly recommend will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Volt

customer_reviews.title: Get The Real Thing
customer_reviews.text: I tried saving a few dollars a few times using different off-brand filters. Toward the end of their life, before the "change filter" light came on, I could see tiny black specks in some of the ice cubes and in the bottom of the glass if I got a glass of cold water from the dispenser. I assume they were charcoal particles. This has never happened with the genuine Whirlpool filters. I'll stick with the "real thing" from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Papa

customer_reviews.title: Nice Packaging and Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple product but one that does its job very well. This is my third filter and I've never had an issue with it. Water that is dispensed from it taste great (great = nothing odd). The toughest part about installing this part is first uninstalling the previous filter that is under pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Tom

customer_reviews.title: This Product Is not What the Picture shows
customer_reviews.text: The photo show 27 filtered impurities. After I had installed the filter, I noticed that the package showed "16" filtered impurities, the old "bait and switch" scheme.
customer_reviews.author: Real Kool

customer_reviews.title: Believe this is a ripoff look alike.
customer_reviews.text: Won't fit. Identical model number to the one in there now. But this one isn't fitting. If you compare the two, there are very subtle differences between them. The seam on this one is sloppy. The size of the water opening at the top different. The decal has bubbles. Anyone can stick a decal on a cheap copy. I think this is a cheap Chinese copy of the real deal. AVOID! I thought I was saving $10, but now I am out $40....
customer_reviews.author: Jamazon

customer_reviews.title: Seems Effective, Price OK, but Recycling Program not Bundled
customer_reviews.text: Works fine in our decade-old twist-style Whirlpool (take the cap off, dummy). Be sure to wash water through it before using the filter for its intended purpose, as noted in the instructions. I have no way to test effectiveness of the filter (there's no detectable taste, which is good), so I must declare it to be acceptable. What isn't acceptable is that the company doesn't provide a convenient return method for recycling this obviously-suitable-for-recycling item. It's offered through a separate program as far as I can determine.
customer_reviews.author: Knowlengr

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t fit
customer_reviews.text: Last night I tried to replace the filter and found out it didn’t fit to my whirlpool side by side fridge. I checked my fridge model number before placed an order. Filter 5 was recommended for my fridge. I am frustrated and bit upset. From now on I am going to buy it from Homedepot or Target. I bought mine in April, it’s bit late to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Chia

customer_reviews.title: and I'm sure it works fine with the right refrigerater
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this was completely wrong for my refrigerator even though the company and site I bought it from claims it would fit my fridge. Had to return... and I'm sure it works fine with the right refrigerater.
customer_reviews.author: tru blu

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this zero stars I would. I paid $42 for this and it NEVER worked. I installed it exactly according to the instructions and it made my fridge even slower than it was with the old filter. I will NEVER buy from this seller again
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Hunsaker

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch of poorly made
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these filters and both broke the same way. The first broke a few days after we installed and it broke during the night causing a lot of flowing in my kitchen so much that the water went thru the ceiling of the room under the kitchen . We were a little lucky with the second it lasted like a month and half and then it broke when we were at home and awake so we shut down the water supply and it did cause much damage.
customer_reviews.author: Flores

customer_reviews.title: Very good product. I live in Irvine and the tap ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good product.I live in Irvine and the tap water has an unpleasant smell but with this filter tastes great.last time I ordered the two pack for $70 and each lasted about a year and could have lasted longer but I just changed it anyway. I only wish the price was a little lower(got it for $45)
customer_reviews.author: mehrdad golchin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Filter
customer_reviews.text: I love this water filter! It filters the water so well. My water is clean, odorless, and tastes great! No need to buy water bottles anymore.
customer_reviews.author: S N

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe the neg reviews about not fitting older 2005 models.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a pur filter pictured above (to show that this will fit older model fridges) .... It **Fit perfectly**. Upon opening the package the protective cap popped off by itself only flew a couple of inches. *I tried canceling this filter because of some negative comments about new style not fitting 2005 and older models.... I'm glad Amazon did not cancel on my Request... because it works great. I'm noticing increased pressure comparing both when new.
customer_reviews.author: Yiorgo

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Price
customer_reviews.text: Have to run at least 4 qts through the filter to remove initial bad taste and the price seems to be inflating entirely too much each time I order, which is about every year. Otherwise, the product produces clean and clear water.
customer_reviews.author: Piratejoe

customer_reviews.title: now made in taiwan
customer_reviews.text: these have gone from US made in 2010 2/$55 to $50 for 1 made in Taiwan. Talk about gouging.
customer_reviews.author: 30 sec spot

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This is a little cheaper than other sights and works well for my refrigerator. My ice cubes were starting to get a weird taste so I bought this replacement filter and now no more weirdness.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Water simply tastes better.  Trust your tastebuds.
customer_reviews.text: While this filter is more expensive and many of the others, the water simply tastes more natural. This is also a brand carried by box box stores like Home Depot. I have tried 2 other brands and found them to be terrible compared to this EveryDrop brand.
customer_reviews.author: ShaunMar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Filter for a Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use filter, that works very well, for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Ylodog

customer_reviews.title: Reduces 16 contaminants Not 24 as advertised !!!
customer_reviews.text: I got mine but had to return it since since I was expecting the one that reduces 24 contaminants as described but I got one that reduces only 16. I found this last one for a lot less at eBay... Hoping they'll correct product description :)
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Bilat

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but correct quality part
customer_reviews.text: Reading the reviews made me skeptical of getting the correct filter on the first try but WOOT got it! My model is a Whirlpool GS5SHAXNL00 with a build date of July 2005. The filter tip matched my old filter and twisted right in. Expensive but correct quality part.
customer_reviews.author: Pitt

customer_reviews.title: Word of advice read up on filters, then buy this one.
customer_reviews.text: Word of advice read up on filters, then buy this one. The certifications of a filter are everything. For what this filter eliminates it is worth the price and ease of mind.
customer_reviews.author: bargin hunnnter

customer_reviews.title: Bad smell and taste
customer_reviews.text: The first filter I had seemed good, no bad taste. This second filter the water has a bad smell and taste still after a month of use. The other 1 star reviews confirmed for me that I should not try buying another one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Libby J Beier

customer_reviews.title: works, but not the best taste.
customer_reviews.text: works and fits as advertised. plugged in completed the flush period, and 1 month later still ahs a weird taste to FL water. Water is odorless and clean looking. don't think there is an issue with the filter, but it water does taste different! Good luck, happy shopping!
customer_reviews.author: Chupi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install. I used the product finder on the everydrop website to find the correct filter. If you need additional help there are plenty of videos online!
customer_reviews.author: Werch

customer_reviews.title: Misleading advertisement
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this filter since we moved into this house two years ago. I have not had any issues with it, water tastes just fine. I noticed last time I ordered it that they increased the amount of contaminants reduced to 27, from the previous 16. When I received the filter, I still got one that said it reduces 16 contaminants. Really not a big deal as it's the same filter I have been using, but they should correct this on the page here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Taste, Even After Flushing
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this filter because it was Whirlpool due to the fear of a knock-off filter having bad taste and questionable origins. I am disappointed that after a month of solid use and following the flushing directions, the water still tastes like plastic. It’s like I’m drinking out of a pool float.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: One Drop is better than any other filter for my refrigerator in contaminant removal.
customer_reviews.text: My older refrigerator takes this type of filter and this brand does more than remove chlorine taste. This brand removes a whole list of contaminants, unlike other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Croll

customer_reviews.title: USED water filter
customer_reviews.text: I just opened the package of my "new" refrigerator water filter and water dripped out of it. Then I noticed that the end that you twist to install it was worn indicating to me that that this is a USED water filter. I am beyond aggravated!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but not best
customer_reviews.text: Glad we bought but can still see little things in our water after like 60 fills. Not too big of a deal but I rather have completely clear water.
customer_reviews.author: Arielle

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, thanks!
customer_reviews.text: A little on the expensive side but if I had to venture a guess, I would say none of the cheaper ones last as long or taste as great. Definitely recommend if you are in the market for a great tasting filter replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Relaxed logic

customer_reviews.title: Awful, tried 3 times
customer_reviews.text: It’s awful. If the water tastes fine at first it only lasts maybe a month. In two other tries, it never tasted like water in the first place. Such a waste.
customer_reviews.author: JHshopper

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My Kitchen Aid refrigerator is old & original equipment filter is no longer available. This replacement filter fits & works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kasi

customer_reviews.title: Good filter for whirlpool fridges
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, no leaks, and water tastes great! Time will tell how long it lasts. I went for the original brand, rather than aftermarket replacement filter, because I didn't want to risk water leaks all over my kitchen floor.
customer_reviews.author: dominoez21

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit
customer_reviews.text: This filter did not fit even though the model number confirms it should fit, and the same filter fit in the past with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: librex

customer_reviews.title: I had the same problem as other reviewers. This ...
customer_reviews.text: I had the same problem as other reviewers. This does not replace the old whirlpool filter #4396508 as advertised.. Had to return filter.. I cannot find a filter made by whirlpool that will fit in my whirlpool fridge now. It does not make sense. I will have to use a generic filter after I already tried a generic that did not filter well. I suppose I will have to keep looking....
customer_reviews.author: C. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Skip the Bottled Water
customer_reviews.text: The water where I live has a terrible aftertaste, but this filter totally removes it. Delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Penguin Shopper 26

customer_reviews.title: so good. Water tastes great and it should given name ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Water tastes great and it should given name and cost of these. Be careful with cheaper products. They don't filter out all of the chemicals of the original Whirlpool filters so read the descriptions.
customer_reviews.author: Islander1072

customer_reviews.title: buy from different vendor to be safe
customer_reviews.text: do not think this was new in package; no paper instruction was included in package and there should have been an insert. filter did not look used, just seemed like package had been opened.
customer_reviews.author: lklem

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality lately.
customer_reviews.text: The last 2 filters I ordered lasted less than 2 month each at most, water flow was so slow after couple weeks of use. This filter used to last at least 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: George Mechael

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: The water from my fridge dispenser has never tasted so good or been so crystal clear.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bigglesworth

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item last year and I did not have a problem. This filter does not filter well and I can still see deposits in the water even after filtering 4 gallons of water!
customer_reviews.author: CCA

customer_reviews.title: Great Filtering At A Price
customer_reviews.text: Excellant filtering and protection. These consistantly last a full six months. The price is high, but the less expensive filters do nt protect to the same degree, nor do they last as long.
customer_reviews.author: Wanderer

customer_reviews.title: My error for not reading carefully.
customer_reviews.text: Needed size 5 and 1st order came and it was a one. I will sell or give to someone who can use it.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Ann Stryker

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit as per the model number.
customer_reviews.text: This item did not fit my refrigerator as per the model number requested. There was fear of damaging the filter housing on the fridge when trying to instal due to product not being manufactured correctly. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto S.

customer_reviews.title: OEM Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Best filter for refrigerator, original equipment, longest lasting of all brands I have tried, and best filtration.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Horrible water flow. Worse than the old filter we replaced it with. What did you do Whirlpool?!
customer_reviews.author: careful shopper

customer_reviews.title: Bad taste after month of use.
customer_reviews.text: After a month of use it started to taste like medicine. I finally decided to switch to reverse osmosis system. Way harder to install but same annual cost and the water taste way better than with this filter.
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandar P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my KitchenAid fridge
customer_reviews.text: More expensive than generic filters but quality, number of substances filtered and fit are exactly what you would want from a superior filter.
customer_reviews.author: 9 Lives

customer_reviews.title: Fool me once...
customer_reviews.text: $40, lasted 1 month compared to the OEM whirlpool filters with cysts reducing media. I’m shopping elsewhere! Fool me once...
customer_reviews.author: J. Hill

customer_reviews.title: It’s the correct model #
customer_reviews.text: If we want filtered water- this is the product for our refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle J. Sigale

customer_reviews.title: New style seems incompatible, but just requires lots of force to install
customer_reviews.text: This new style was much harder to install than the Whirlpool filters I've been buying for years. If I hadn't read the reviews I would have assumed it was incompatible. I used a wrench directly on the back tab to turn it into place, where in the past I've been able to turn it into place with the cover knob over the rear. Not very impressive for OEM parts.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Way better than the cheap knock-offs...
customer_reviews.text: Don't try to save a few bucks with the cheaper knock-offs that left "floaters" in our water no matter how long we purged the new cheaper filter. This one works as expected, you get what you pay for with water filters.
customer_reviews.author: SVincze

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit Whirlpool GD5PHAXMS10.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my Whirlpool model GD5PHAXMS10, and it did not fit. I returned it and ordered the WaterSentinel WSW-2which fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby A.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy as replacement for Whirpool 4396510
customer_reviews.text: This claims to be a replacement for Whirpool 4396510 and it does not fit. The top part of the filter is too short to fit correctly. The filter does seem to fit and will lock in place but the top part is too short for the water to filter through it correctly.
customer_reviews.author: cagirl27

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit my older ED2SHAXML10 Whirlpool fridge!
customer_reviews.text: According to Whirlpool's website, this is the filter for my fridge. But it doesn't actually fit, and has a slightly different design. It appears that others have had this problem and that Whirlpool is aware of the problem -- so I'm pretty surprised it hasn't been resolved.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Good quality water filter for Whirlpool side by side. It reduces lots of impurities that other foreign-made filters leave it. Manufactured by people who make PUR
customer_reviews.author: RL in Minnesota

customer_reviews.title: Pricey - but the only filter that removes lead and fits my Kitchenaid fridge
customer_reviews.text: Given all the concerns with water quality and who knows what is in the pipes of my old city, I feel better having a filter that removes lead in addition to the regular stuff that all the rest remove. After much research and discussion, I opted to spend more for the lead free option.
customer_reviews.author: BonWil

customer_reviews.title: Filter
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Keeps me from having to go pick it up. Glad I can order
customer_reviews.author: D. P. Irizarry

customer_reviews.title: Easy to change water dispenser filter
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to swap out. A bit aggravating to have to run 3-4 gallons prior to use, but otherwise works great.
customer_reviews.author: ChrystinP

customer_reviews.title: Same filter for less
customer_reviews.text: Same filter but for much less than buying direct from Whirlpool. I'll be buying this regularly​ from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Took The Mineral Taste Out Of Our Water
customer_reviews.text: Our city water comes from springs that have lots of minerals. We bought bottled water to drink and make coffee. But this water filter for my fridge has changed all that. The water tastes wonderful now in coffee or just iced. These filters are so much better than the old ones.
customer_reviews.author: Aelle

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 20 yr old fridge. Was easy to install and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy K

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Very good water filter for my refrigerator. I've used this filter for years and have never had a problem with it.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great! The water tastes like we bought a new fridge!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: The ease it is to order this product and get it home with ease
customer_reviews.text: I purchase with because I am happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two months
customer_reviews.text: After just two months the flow is so restricted my kids would rather drink from the tap that wait 2 minutes to pour a glass from the fridge. I've never had this with other filters
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Let's deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: These filters are really easy to install and great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: NEZ

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting water
customer_reviews.text: I had been using a different model of filter, but it isn't manufactured anymore. This one is great! The water tastes just as good as bottled. I have a Kitchenaid refigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Marshie

customer_reviews.title: but I think they are the best.
customer_reviews.text: Tried other brands including one sold by Home Depot with their name brand, but none of them seemed to work as well as this one. Some gave the water an usual taste. These are not cheap, but I think they are the best.
customer_reviews.author: GD

customer_reviews.title: It's the original
customer_reviews.text: The filter is the original best of the filters. It purifies the water by removing far more chemicals and pathogens that generic filters. It's well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: R. Moreno

customer_reviews.title: It works fine, but I can taste the chlorine in the ...
customer_reviews.text: It works fine, but I can taste the chlorine in the water. I live in Los Angeles, if that helps
customer_reviews.author: Leila Bamdad

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit
customer_reviews.text: This filter claims to replace Whirlpool model 4396508, but it does not fit. I had to return it. If anyone has a frig as old as mine (1998 Whirlpool Model ED25RF) I am still looking for one that will work,
customer_reviews.author: PrimeShopperinNC

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This fit and hopefully is filtering the chemicals-I’d buy again-can’t beat the price and have had no issues
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Filters the water
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install filters water as described but a bit expensive...
customer_reviews.author: Chris G.

customer_reviews.title: FLUSH 4 GALLONS OF WATER BEFORE USE
customer_reviews.text: It sure is a pain in the butt to flush 4 gallons of water, but the filter works well. The water tastes good =]
customer_reviews.author: Soul

customer_reviews.title: Problem solved
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to replace. Ice maker started working immediately. Simple solution to what was thought to be a major problem.
customer_reviews.author: photography39

product_meta.title: EveryDrop by Whirlpool Refrigerator Water Filter 5, EDR5RXD1 (Pack of 1)
feature_bullets: Make sure this fits by entering your refrigerator model number.
everydrop Filter 5 is the only filter approved by: Whirlpool, Maytag, Amana, KitchenAid and JennAir brands.
Certified to reduce 99% of lead, offering superior contaminant reduction for you and your family.
Reduces 27 contaminants including including lead, pesticides, pharmaceuticals, and waterborne parasites (NSF 401, 53 and 42 certified).
Filter packaging may vary with different contaminate reduction levels due to changes in testing standards.
Certified to fit these leading refrigerator brands: Whirlpool, maytag, kitchenaid, jenn-air and amana
Used in bottom freezer and side-by-side refrigerators
Replace filter every 6 months or 200 gallons to maximize contaminant reduction
